Name: Eblis
Traits: Innate Spellcasting. The eblis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:1/day each: blur, hypnotic pattern, minor illusion
Actions: Multiattack. The eblis attacks twice with its beak. Beak. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
